item.description:
We had to change the date of this yard party due to rain. Hope you can make the new day and time.  Please change your RSVP if you can no longer make it.

Come and relax after a few long days of rain and watch the pugs get some much needed play time.

I will have drinks and snacks, but feel free to bring what you would like. 

The yard is fully enclosed and pug proof.

Parking is allowed on the street, but please hold tight to your pups as the street is very busy.

Linda Kay (groomer) will be joining us and will be doing grooming for a fee. 
She does nail clipping, ear and wrinkle cleaning as well as a quick brush out for a very reasonable price.
item.how_to_find_us: 404 Lynnfield Street, Lynn, MA (light blue ranch.)

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: Yard Party at the Webster's (Fonzi, Sam, Ari and Michi)
